original_title: The Polyphonic Spree - Live In NYC
overview: The Polyphonic Spree toured in three phases during 2012.  They decided to document the experience with a live recording at Webster Hall in New York City on May 23, 2012. In addition to the audio recording, they hired a six person camera crew to document the evening in New York.
title: The Polyphonic Spree - Live In NYC
